mapper.select: SELECT A.order_id orderId, A.created_at createdAt,C.p_title title,C.p_name name,B.`count` count,B.total_price price,A.shipment shipment FROM order_list A INNER JOIN order_detail B ON A.order_id = B.order_id INNER JOIN product C ON B.product_id = C.product_id where iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
